description: This file defines API functions related to Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) utilities, including key generation parameter initialization and private key encoding. It contains function declarations, licensing information, and descriptive comments.

methods.name: PKIUtilityInitKeyGenParams
methods.description: Initializes key generation parameters based on provided certificate and private key information.

methods.name: PKIUtilityGetPrivateKeyInfoEncoding
methods.description: Generates the encoded private key information from key generation parameters and key type.
